Articles.Content:
I have discovered a couple bugs for Xbox one version of this game. 

1. You can’t use punctuation when in the description portion of naming your crafts, it won’t let you use a comma or period or any other puncuation.

2. Sometimes in the SPH and the VAB the camera will stop being able to rotate. It stays stationary until you exit out of the building and go back in. 

3. You can’t give your kerbal a custom name while using the debug cheat menu. You can make a custom kerbal, but you can’t name them, only hit randomize name.
Also if you cheat gravity and return it to 1, it won't return to normal gravity.
The camera lockup can be undone by opening the extended info on a part in the menu and then closing it
